body:
OK so what do you think about changing `global.sass`

``` sass
  .profile, .mailing, .conference
    dl
      // margin-bottom: 1em
      @include clearfix
    dt
      float: left
      width: 100px
      font-weight: normal
  .conference
    dt
      width: 120px
```

into

``` sass
  .profile, .mailing, .conference
    dl
      // margin-bottom: 1em
      @include clearfix
    dt
      float: left
      width: 100px
      font-weight: normal
  .conference
    dl
      width: 100%
    dt
      width: 15%
      text-align: left
```

with also changing `dl` to `dl.dl-horizontal` in both `show.html.slim` files for seasons and conference views?
